summary: This mod makes the armor of Karliah from light armor to chlothes and playable. The boots have the spell loudless. You can find them in a chest at the Honey Brewery at Whiterun. It does NOT replace the original.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the armor of Karliah from light armor to chlothes and playable. 
The boots have the spell muffeled movement. 
You can find them in a chest at the Honey Brewery at Whiterun. 
It does NOT replace the original.
Workshop ( http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11460 )
author: Wurstbraten
